metadata.name: A Phoenix is Born
metadata.description:
"Beyond the test of fire, defying the cycle of life, the phoenix is reborn from its ashes".

You must have had many hardships in the past, that makes you feel suffocated, empty and lifeless. As the poet rightly says, "Only the test of fire makes fine steel", these life experiences make you stronger, to rise like a Phoenix, and to be reborn as gentle and pure like an angel.  

These paintings are reflections of my past where I try to portray these musings.

May the fireflies follow you, guard you and guide you towards the light!
